title: [Large-Scale] Practical Application Strategies for Enhancing Language Proficiency and Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using language in work environments
context.additional_context: Program for learners in managerial/leadership roles, aiming to enhance linguistic efficiency and creative problem-solving skills in workplace contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can objectively assess their vocabulary and sentence construction skills using a language maturity diagnostic tool.
Learners can explain the correlation between language maturity and creative thinking based on regression analysis results.
Learners can present three or more creative problem-solving strategies using linguistic diversity in daily work and communication situations.
